rows.label: qst711101_msg0001
rows.name: Hey. I'm Isabella.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm a somewhat famous
adventurer here in Iira.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0003
rows.name: Do you all know about Sealstones?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0004
rows.name:
A long time ago... a famous adventurer
named Blue Kevi Seal traveled all
over Alst looking for treasure.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0005
rows.name:
But when he was adventuring in
Iira, he collected too much treasure
and couldn't carry it all...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0006
rows.name:
So, to prevent anyone from stealing it,
he decided to seal the treasure in a stone,
along with the surrounding monsters.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0007
rows.name:
He planned to come back to
Iira and retrieve it later.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0008
rows.name: But that opportunity never came...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0009
rows.name:
That's why the seal Kevi Seal
left behind is called a Sealstone,
and it remains to this day...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0010
rows.name:
Kevi Seal was a narrow-minded,
good-for- nothing, but it's an
interesting story, right?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0011
rows.name:
What do you think of
the Sealstone story?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0012
rows.name: Interesting

rows.label: qst711101_msg0013
rows.name: Boring

rows.label: qst711101_msg0014
rows.name:
You get it? I'm happy to have
found someone who understands!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0015
rows.name:
I'll tell you an even
more interesting story.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0016
rows.name:
There's a rumor that there's a
Sealstone in the nearby Haradd Hills.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0017
rows.name:
I came here to look for it,
but I couldn't find it...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0018
rows.name:
I was just about to head
back to the capital.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0019
rows.name: But you all might be able to find it.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0020
rows.name:
When you find the Sealstone, hold
out your hand and chant "Kevi
Seal is the best" three times.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0021
rows.name:
Yes... I know you feel
like complaining...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0022
rows.name:
But to break the seal, you have no
choice but to praise Kevi Seal. You
don't have to mean it, though.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0023
rows.name:
When you break the seal, monsters
will keep appearing, so you
have to defeat them all.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0024
rows.name:
Then, the treasure Kevi Seal
hid will finally appear.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0025
rows.name:
If you happen to get the
treasure, let me know.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0026
rows.name: I want to hear your exciting story.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0027
rows.name:
Well then, I'll be waiting
with anticipation.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0102
rows.name: I see, I see.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0103
rows.name: Then this story ends here.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0201
rows.name: Oh?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0202
rows.name:
Could it be that you found the
Sealstone and got the treasure?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0203
rows.name:
If you don't mind, please
tell me the details.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0204
rows.name:
Just as I thought, you
all are quite skilled!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0205
rows.name:
How about it? Why not become
adventurers and make a fortune?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0206
rows.name:
There's a legend that gold is
buried in the deserts of Iira...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0207
rows.name:
If I team up with you all, I
think we could make a killing.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0208
rows.name: ...Just kidding.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0209
rows.name:
I can't have any more
tough competitors.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0210
rows.name: Anyway, thanks for the exciting story.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0211
rows.name:
There are rumors of other Sealstones
in Iira, so do your best.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0311
rows.name:
There's a rumor that there's a
Sealstone in the nearby Haradd Hills.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0312
rows.name:
When you find the Sealstone, hold
out your hand and chant "Kevi
Seal is the best" three times.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0313
rows.name:
Then monsters will appear, but if
you defeat them, you'll get to see
the treasure Kevi Seal hid.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0314
rows.name: When you get the treasure, let me know.
